name: Axe Throw
description:
Axe Throw Inspired by Avengers Event on Fortnite

Stormbreaker Thor

  • WASD to move
  • Aim by pressing left click
  • Release to throw the axe
  • Left click again to return the axe

All the Animations and the 3D Model are from Mixamo

Stormbreaker is from https://sketchfab.com/tharkadharshana
I also coded a shader for the cel shading affect
